name: Tuned Personalization
description: V1.3 tuning: Maximum personalization with 5.0x bookmark weight, 85% similarity weight, and sum-of-similarities mode for improved bookmark weighting tests

tuning_rationale.bookmark_weight_5.0: Increased from 2.0 to create strong differentiation for bookmark weighting tests
tuning_rationale.weight_similarity_0.85: Near-maximum personalization to amplify user interest signal
tuning_rationale.weight_quality_0.10: Minimal quality influence to let personalization dominate
tuning_rationale.use_sum_similarities_true: Preserves interest diversity better than mean-pooling
